description: This file declares the FbSettings class, which is a plugin component for the WPEFramework, handling JSONRPC communication and implementing the PluginHost::IPlugin interface. It references external interfaces such as IFbSettings and manages plugin lifecycle methods.

classes.name: FbSettings
classes.description: A plugin class implementing JSONRPC communication for Facebook settings, inheriting from PluginHost::IPlugin and PluginHost::JSONRPC, managing initialization, deinitialization, and notifications.

methods.name: FbSettings
methods.description: Constructor for the FbSettings plugin class, initializes internal members.

methods.name: ~FbSettings
methods.description: Destructor for the FbSettings class, performs cleanup.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Prepares the plugin for operation, setting up necessary interfaces.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up the plugin, releasing resources.

methods.name: string Information() const
methods.description: Returns plugin information as a string; here it returns an empty string.

methods.name: Deactivated
methods.description: Handles the event when a remote connection is deactivated, associated with the plugin's connection management.

ctags.name: FbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^        class FbSettings : public PluginHost::IPlugin, public PluginHost::JSONRPC {$/

ctags.name: Information
ctags.pattern: /^            virtual string Information() const override { return {}; }$/
